00176 typedef std::map<std::string, ComediEmul::Profile> ProfileMap;
00177 static ProfileMap profileMap;
00178 
00179 void ComediEmul::setProfile(const char *devfile, Profile p)
00180 {
00181     if (p < N_PROFILES) 
00182         profileMap[devfile] = p;
00183 }
00184 
00185 ComediEmul::Profile ComediEmul::getProfile(const char *devfile)
00186 {
00187     return profileMap[devfile];
00188 }
00189 
00190 typedef std::map<std::string, ComediEmul *> InstanceMap;
00191 static InstanceMap instances;
00192 
00193 ComediEmul::ComediEmul(Profile p)
00194     : refCount(0)
00195 {
00196     if (p < N_PROFILES) memcpy(&dev, &profiles[p], sizeof(Dev));    
00197 }
00198 
00199 ComediEmul::~ComediEmul() { /* noop, but private */ }
00200 
00201 ComediEmul *ComediEmul::getInstance(const char *devfile)
00202 {
00203     InstanceMap::iterator it = instances.find(devfile);
00204     if (it == instances.end()) {
00205         instances.insert(InstanceMap::value_type(devfile, new ComediEmul(profileMap[devfile])));
00206         it = instances.find(devfile);
00207     }
00208     ++it->second->refCount;
00209     return it->second;
00210 }
00211 
00212 void ComediEmul::putInstance(ComediEmul *c) 
00213 {
00214     if (--c->refCount <= 0) {
00215         InstanceMap::iterator it;
00216         for (it = instances.begin(); it != instances.end(); ++it) {
00217             if (it->second == c) {
00218                 delete c;
00219                 instances.erase(it);
00220                 return;
00221             }
00222         }
00223     }
00224 }
00225 
00226 int ComediEmul::findByType(int type, unsigned first) const
00227 {
00228     for (unsigned i = first; i < dev.nsubdevs; ++i)
00229         if (dev.subdevs[i].type == type) return i;
00230     return -1;
00231 }
00232 
00233 int ComediEmul::getNChans(unsigned sd) const
00234 {
00235     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs) {
00236         return dev.subdevs[sd].nchans;
00237     }
00238     return -1;
00239 }

00241 int ComediEmul::getNRanges(unsigned sd, unsigned ch) const
00242 {
00243     (void)ch;
00244     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs) {
00245         return dev.subdevs[sd].nranges;
00246     }
00247     return -1;

00250 int ComediEmul::getKRange(unsigned sd, unsigned ch, unsigned r, comedi_krange *out) const
00251 {
00252     (void)ch;
00253     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs && r < dev.subdevs[sd].nranges) {
00254         memcpy(out, &dev.subdevs[sd].ranges[r], sizeof(*out));
00255         return 0;
00256     }
00257     return -1;    
00258 }
00259 lsampl_t ComediEmul::getMaxData(unsigned sd, unsigned ch) const
00260 {
00261     (void)ch;
00262     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs) {
00263         return dev.subdevs[sd].maxdata;
00264     }
00265     return 0;
00266 }
00267 int ComediEmul::dioConfig(unsigned sd, unsigned ch, int io)
00268 {
00269     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs && dev.subdevs[sd].type == COMEDI_SUBD_DIO
00270         && ch < dev.subdevs[sd].nchans
00271         && (io == COMEDI_INPUT || io == COMEDI_OUTPUT)) {
00272         dev.subdevs[sd].configs[ch] = io;
00273         return 0;
00274     }
00275     return -1;
00276 }
00277 
00278 int ComediEmul::dioGetConfig(unsigned sd, unsigned ch) const
00279 {
00280     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs && dev.subdevs[sd].type == COMEDI_SUBD_DIO
00281         && ch < dev.subdevs[sd].nchans) {
00282         return dev.subdevs[sd].configs[ch];
00283     }
00284     return -1;
00285 }
00286 
00287 int ComediEmul::dioBitField(unsigned sd, unsigned mask, unsigned *bits)
00288 {
00289     unsigned & b = *bits;
00290     int ret = 0;
00291     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs && dev.subdevs[sd].type == COMEDI_SUBD_DIO) {
00292         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dev.subdevs[sd].nchans; ++i) {
00293             if ( ((1<<i) & mask) && dev.subdevs[sd].configs[i] == COMEDI_OUTPUT ) {
00294                 dataWrite(sd, i, 0,  (b>>i) & 0x1 );
00295                 ++ret;
00296             }
00297             if (dev.subdevs[sd].configs[i] == COMEDI_INPUT) {
00298                 lsampl_t samp = 0;
00299                 dataRead(sd, i, 0, &samp);
00300                 b &= ~(1<<i); // now, clear bit
00301                 b |= (samp?1:0)<<i; // and set it if it came in as set
00302                 ++ret;
00303             }
00304         }
00305         return ret;
00306     }
00307     return -1;
00308 }
00309 
00310 int ComediEmul::dataWrite(unsigned sd, unsigned ch, unsigned range, lsampl_t data)
00311 {
00312     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs && ch < dev.subdevs[sd].nchans && range < dev.subdevs[sd].nranges) {
00313         double min = dev.subdevs[sd].ranges[range].min * 1e-6, max = dev.subdevs[sd].ranges[range].max * 1e-6;
00314         double maxdata = dev.subdevs[sd].maxdata;
00315         dev.subdevs[sd].chanData[ch] = (data/maxdata) * (max-min) + min;
00316         return 1;
00317     }
00318     return -1;
00319 }
00320 int ComediEmul::dataRead(unsigned sd, unsigned ch, unsigned range, lsampl_t * data) const
00321 {
00322     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs && ch < dev.subdevs[sd].nchans && range < dev.subdevs[sd].nranges) {
00323         double min = dev.subdevs[sd].ranges[range].min * 1e-6, max = dev.subdevs[sd].ranges[range].max * 1e-6;
00324         double maxdata = dev.subdevs[sd].maxdata;
00325         *data = static_cast<int>(maxdata * ((dev.subdevs[sd].chanData[ch] - min)/(max-min)));
00326         return 1;
00327     }
00328     return -1;    
00329 }
00330 
00331 double ComediEmul::read(unsigned sd, unsigned ch) const
00332 {
00333     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs && ch < dev.subdevs[sd].nchans)
00334         return dev.subdevs[sd].chanData[ch];
00335     return 0.;
00336 }
00337 void   ComediEmul::write(unsigned sd, unsigned ch, double v)
00338 {
00339     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs && ch < dev.subdevs[sd].nchans)
00340         dev.subdevs[sd].chanData[ch] = v;
00341 }
00342 
00343 int ComediEmul::getSubdevType(unsigned sd) const
00344 {
00345     if (sd < dev.nsubdevs) return dev.subdevs[sd].type;
00346     return -1;
00347 }
